TopicTitle: translation in edit moves parts unintentionally

Articles.Content:
When I choose rotate or move on parts in VAB or SPH the parts jumps to a different position after touching the arrows.

e.g. I try to move it up a little, touch the up arrow and the part jumps to the left.

Yes I have experienced this as well. I am fairly sure this is a real bug it existed in .90 as well. I dont think it is at the top of Squads fix list yet as it is minor and can be undone by the user. It is extremely annoying though.
